properties.name: halo.plugin.auto-start-plugin
properties.description: Auto start plugin when main app is ready.

properties.name: halo.plugin.enabled-plugins
properties.description: Plugins enabled by default, prior to `disabledPlugins`.

properties.name: halo.plugin.exact-version-allowed
properties.description: Set to true to allow requires expression to be exactly x.y.z. The default is false, meaning that using an exact version x.y.z will implicitly mean the same as >=x.y.z.

properties.name: halo.plugin.fixed-plugin-path
properties.description: The default plugin path is obtained through file scanning. In the development mode, you can specify the plugin path as the project directory.

properties.name: halo.plugin.plugins-root
properties.description: Plugin root directory: default “plugins”; when non-jar mode plugin, the value should be an absolute directory address.

properties.name: halo.plugin.system-version
properties.description: The system version used for comparisons to the plugin requires attribute.

properties.name: halo.required-extension-disabled
properties.description: This property could stop initializing required Extensions defined in classpath. See {@link run.halo.app.infra.ExtensionResourceInitializer#REQUIRED_EXTENSION_LOCATIONS} for more.
